# kvlm-timeline

Wraps a timeline items.

## Properties

| Property    | Attribute   | Modifiers | Type                      | Default    |
|-------------|-------------|-----------|---------------------------|------------|
| `direction` | `direction` |           | `"forward" \| "backward"` | "backward" |
| `role`      | `role`      | readonly  | `"list"`                  | "list"     |
